content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a toy train or vehicle made of blocks
- It consists of two main parts: a locomotive/house section and a cargo wagon
- Multiple layers are present, with blocks stacked on cylindrical supports
- Colors used: red, orange, yellow, blue
- Total blocks needed: approximately 12-15 pieces

Structure Breakdown:
1. Base layer: Yellow rectangular blocks and orange cylinders
2. Middle layer: Red and blue cubic blocks on the wagon, red arch structure
3. Top layer: Orange triangular roof pieces

Assembly Instructions:
{
Step1: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block for wagon base)
Step2: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) as left wagon wheel
Step3: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) as right wagon wheel
Step4: Move block with index 4 (blue cube) for wagon cargo
Step5: Move block with index 7 (red cube) for wagon cargo
Step6: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block) for main structure base left
Step7: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block) for main structure base right
Step8: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder) for front support
Step9: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder) for middle support
Step10: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder) for rear support
Step11: Move block with index 1 (red arch) for house structure
Step12: Move block with index 14 (orange triangle) for left roof
Step13: Move block with index 14 (orange triangle) for right roof
}

This assembly sequence builds the structure from bottom to top, ensuring stability throughout the construction process.
